# Get the Data

spotify_songs <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2020/2020-01-21/spotify_songs.csv')

The <- spotify_songs |> 
  filter(str_detect(playlist_genre, "r.|e.")) |>
  select(playlist_genre, track_name) |>
  mutate(jazz_count = str_extract_all(track_name, "\\b[Jj][Aa]?[Zz]{2}")) 

print(The)

print("The name '/Jazz/' appears" + " " + "times" + "in the titles of R&B, Rap, and EDM songs from the SpotifyR dataset. The folowing songs contain my name:" + " " + ". As I try to imagine myself as an early-career professional, I'm using Spotify API data to pursue a thought experiement. I rhetorically ask, ")
